titleStmt.title: The guide mistaken, and temporizing rebuked, or, A brief reply to Jonathan Clapham's book intituled, A guide to the true religion in which his religion is confuted, his hypocrisie is detected, his aspersions are reprehended, his contradictions are compared / by W.P., a friend to the true religion.
titleStmt.author: Penn, William, 1644-1718.

notesStmt.note: This item can be found separately at reel 574:6 and together with Wing C56 ad P1389 at reel 376:17.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
